# Cerebrum Forex - AI Trading Software

> AI-Powered EUR/USD Trading Co-Pilot for MetaTrader 5

## Summary
Cerebrum Forex is a sophisticated desktop application that uses 5 machine learning models (XGBoost, LightGBM, RandomForest, CatBoost, Stacking) to predict EUR/USD market movements in real-time. It connects to MetaTrader 5 via a custom Expert Advisor to execute or suggest trades.

## Core Features
1. **AI Prediction Engine**: Real-time signals (BUY/SELL/NEUTRAL) with confidence scores for 6 timeframes (M1-H4).
2. **MetaTrader 5 Integration**: Seamless connection for data extraction and trade execution.
3. **Prop Firm Mode**: Dedicated risk management tools for FTMO/MFF challenges (Drawdown limits, Daily loss caps).
4. **Local Processing**: All AI models run locally on the user's machine for privacy and speed.
5. **Smart Training**: Users can retrain models on their own extracted broker data.

## Technical Stack
- **Backend/GUI**: Python (PyQt6), scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM.
- **Frontend (Website)**: Next.js 14, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion.
- **Documentation**: Sphinx (HTML).

## Links
- **Website**: https://cerebrumfx.com
